title: Deepak Chopra Speaks with Dr. Larry Dossey
author: Deepak Chopra
description: Spiritual teacher Deepak Chopra talks with integrative medicine expert Dr. Larry Dossey about his lifelong work on consciousness and healing at the Sages and Scientists Symposium. Listen to this fascinating conversation in which they explore merging scien
cleaned_text: Spiritual teacher Deepak Chopra talks with integrative medicine expert Dr. Larry Dossey about his lifelong work on consciousness and healing at the Sages and Scientists Symposium. Listen to this fascinating conversation in which they explore merging science and spirituality.
